profile.title: Profael (User Profile)
profile.mustLogin: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ mu ansa na wobetumi ahu nhyehyɛe no.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Kyerɛ deɛ wɔtwerɛɛ no ne nkyerɛaseɛ no
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Kyerɛ ɔtwerɛde titiriw ne nkyerɛaseɛ no abom
profile.allowExplicitContent: Ma nsɛm a ɛyɛ mmɔborɔhunu kwan
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sɛkɛnd a ɛtɔ so na ɛpopa no kɔ
profile.saveError: Mfomso: Yentumi annto nhyehyɛe no so
profile.noPrivateKey: Ɛwɔ sɛkrɛt safoa (private key) biara nni saa fidie yi so na wobɛtumi asɔe.
profile.setBackupPassword: Hyɛeɛ bɔbea kɔd (password) ma wo backup no:
profile.backupDownloaded: Backup a wɔabɔ kɔd no atwe kɔ.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Hyɛ kɔd a wɔde bɔɔ backup yi mu:
profile.importSuccess: Sɛkrɛt safoa no aba fidie yi so.
profile.importFailed: Key import annkɔ yiye (kɔd yɛ mfomso anaa fael no asɛe).
profile.keysRotated: Wɔawo safoa foforo na wɔde public key no asoma.
profile.importKey: Fa backup a wɔabɔ kɔd mu no bra
profile.keyDisclaimer: Wo private key mfi fidie yi so. Sɔe baako a wɔabɔ kɔd mu na fa so san sie wɔ fidie foforo so.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Wowɔ Free so—fa Sun/Moon ntɛmntɛm no. Fa Upgrade na woanya tema bebree.
profile.backupTitle: Backups a wɔabɔ kɔd & Fidie Sync
profile.backupDesc: Yɛ password-bɔ backups ma wo keys; fa san bra wɔ fidie foforo so na kɔka ho.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Dɛw (blur) bere a app no nni anim
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ka me kyerɛ sɛ obi copy me asɛm
profile.followHint: Wobɛhunu wɔn stories wɔ ‘Following’ mu sɛ wɔde ma ‘Followers’ anaa ‘Public’.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Biribi ankɔ yie wɔ sekhyɛn yi mu.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fa frɛ ne nkratoɔ a ɛreba kɔ wo afono a wɔasiesie anaa email. Nkratoɔ/frɛ a efiri wo nkyɛn betumi ada wo Chatforia nɔma.

chat.selectPrompt: Paw nkratoɔ anaa chat room bi na fi ase kasa
chat.emptySubtitle: Fa nkratoɔ kɔ na fi ase nkɔmmɔ.

status.captionLabel: Dɛn na ɛwɔ wo adwene so?
status.chooseRecipients: Paw wɔn a ɛkɔ wɔn nkyɛn
status.filesNote: Fael kɔsi 5. Ɛtɔ da 24 mu na ehu.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Kɔ mu na sesa wo nhyehyɛe.

auth.headline: Banbɔ mu, wiase nyinaa mu nkratoɔ kɔ nkyerɛaseɛ ntɛm ara
auth.description: End-to-end banbɔ, AI nkyerɛaseɛ, nsɛm a ɛyera, ne voice/video afrɛ.

feature.privacy: Siesɛm-kɔ-anim. Wo data yɛ wo dea.

auth.desktopTip: Wɔ kɔmputa so? Fa wo fon scan na fa app no.
auth.subhead: Siesie, banbɔ, na nkyerɛaseɛ bere-mu — ntɛm ara.
auth.tip: Wobetumi de Chatforia adi dwuma wɔ akyɛde biara so — anaa fa app no na nya sukyerɛ pa.
auth.scanHint: Scan na fa app no anaa bue wɔ wɛb browser.

home.title: Fie
home.subheader: Fa nkratoɔ kɔ na fi ase nkɔmmɔ.
home.sendTooltipEmpty: Kyerɛw asɛmfua ansa na wotumi soma

press.title: Amannufo (Press)
press.contact: Sɛ wopɛ amanneɛ ho nsɛm a, kyerɛw kɔ press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Sɛ wopɛ amanneɛ ho nsɛm a, kyerɛw kɔ press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia yɛ kɔmmɔ app a ɛwɔ banbɔ kɛse ne nkyerɛaseɛ ntɛm, yɛde ayɛ ma nkɔmmɔ wiase nyinaa mu.
press.assetsText: Logos, screenshots, ne adwumadene mfonini (reba ɛkyɛre).

careers.title: Adwuma (Careers)
careers.intro: Yɛyɛ akumaa kuw bi a yɛreyɛ kɔmmɔ app a ɛwɔ banbɔ, hohoro-ho, ne deɛ ɛyɛ dɛ. Sɛ wopɛ banbɔ (encryption), accessibility, ne UX a ɛyɛ fɛ a, yɛpɛ wo.
careers.openRoles: Adwumade a ɛwɔ hɔ: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Sɛ wopɛ a: Sɛnd wo CV/links kɔ jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Fa Chatforia ho
about.description: Chatforia yɛ kɔmmɔ app a ɛwɔ kasa bebree mu, end-to-end banbɔ, nkyerɛaseɛ ntɛm, ne voice/video afrɛ. Yɛn botae ne sɛ: ma nkabom nyɛ den—siesie, suro-ho, na kasa mu nyinaa.

values.control: Tumi wɔ wo ho so: Nsɛm a ɛyera & read receipts yɛ pɛ.

about.howDescription: Wɔde nsɛm si wo fidie so ansa na ɛbɛkɔe. Nkyerɛaseɛ, backups, ne fidie-kae yɛde ayɛ na yɛnhunu data pii.

advertise.title: Bɔ adwuma wɔ Chatforia
advertise.description: Du kɔmmɔ adwumayɛfo a wɔde bere di dwuma wɔ nhyehyɛe a ɛyɛ fɛ na ɛyɛ brand-safe. Yɛwɔ display, sponsɔship, ne house promos. Premiumfo renhunu ads.

adsense.withPubId: Seesei yɛde Google AdSense na yɛde ads ba. Sɛ wopɛ ɛnam Google Ads so a, fa publisher ID {{pubId}} na bisa managed placement wɔ unit a ɛda aseɛ yi. Yɛwɔ direct sponsɔship nso—fa form no yɛ adwuma.
adsense.noPubId: Seesei yɛde Google AdSense na yɛde ads ba. Direct sponsɔship nso wɔ hɔ—fa form no yɛ adwuma.

advertise.noPlacements: Wɔnhyehyɛ placements mpo. Fa ka wɔn wɔ ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Bere-dodoɔ ne bere-tenten wɔ chat UI
why.brandSafe: Brand-safe format; frequency capping a ɛyɛ obu
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsɔ moment (te sɛ “Start a Chat” modal) wɔ hɔ
why.deals: Direct deals anaa programmatic wɔ AdSense/Google Ads mu

form.submittedMsg: Meda wo ase! Yɛabenya wo asɛmmisa. Yɛbɛsan frɛ wo ntɛm.
form.missingRequired: Yɛsrɛ wo hyɛ din, email, ne asɛmmisa no mu.
form.successToast: Meda wo ase! Yɛbɛtɔ wo so akɔpem.
form.mailtoInfo: Rebue wo email kɔlaent na ɔmɛsoma asɛmmisa no…
form.messagePlaceholder: Targeting, bere, KPI, ne placement a wopɛ…

legal.disclaimerStart: Sɛ wosoma a, wogye tom yɛn

upgrade.title: Upgrade
upgrade.subtitle: Paw plan a ɛfata wo: yi ads kɔ na fa Plus, anaa nya tumi-ndwuma nyinaa wɔ Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Fi ase
gettingStarted.subtitle: Foforo wɔ Chatforia? Kyerɛkyerɛtia yi bɛkyerɛ akɛse no mu, na awiei wubetumi ayɛ adwuma ntɛm.

alert.text: Yɛbɛtoaso akyɛ kɔ na yɛde nneɛma foforo bɛka ho. Sɛ biribi nni hɔ a, nsrɛ yɛn wɔ

section1.title: 1) Bɔ wo akuntyɛ
section1.loginText: wɔ wo akuntyɛ a wowɔ dada no mu.

section2.title: 2) Fi ase kɔmmɔ
section2.item1: Yɛ DM anaa Kuw na fa nkratoɔ kɔ.
section2.item2: Fa nkyerɛaseɛ ntɛm na kasa wɔ kasa 100+ mu.
section2.item3: Sɔ nsɛm a ɛyera ne read receipts wɔ Profael → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) Kɔ anim
section3.item1Part2: kratafa so (Plus = ad-free, Premium = tumi-ndwuma nyinaa).
section3.item2Part1: Ka fidie foforo ho na si backups wɔ

account.q: Sɛnea mɛbɔ anaa mɛsan nya me akuntyɛ?
account.a: Twe app no anaa fa web, kɔ “Bɔ akuntyɛ”, si w’email/fon. Sɛ wopɛ asan anya a, fa “Wo werɛ fi kɔd no?”

privacy.a: Yiw. Nsɛm ne afrɛ yɛ end-to-end banbɔ. Wo ne nea wokasa no nko ara na mote no.

translate.q: Nkyerɛaseɛ ntɛm no yɛ dɛn di adwuma?
translate.a: Sɔ “Auto-translate” wɔ Settings → Appearance & Language. Yɛyɛ no wɔ fidie so baabi a ɛbɛtumi, kosi a na yɛde API a ɛwɔ banbɔ di dwuma na data ketewa nko ara kɔ.

contact.a: Kyerɛw kɔ support@chatforia.com. Fa screenshots ne app version ka ho.

contact.title: Fɛre Yɛn
contact.successMsg: Meda wo ase — yɛbɛsa wo e-mail mu.
contact.errorSend: Enntumi ansom. Yɛsrɛ wo kyerɛw kɔ support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Siesɛm Nhyiam yi kyerɛ sɛnea Chatforia (“yɛn”) boaboa, di dwuma, na kyɛ infɔmehyɛn bere a wode yɛn app ne asomdwoeɛ nyinaa di dwuma. Yɛde Chatforia ayɛ na ɛbɛma data a yɛte ho atɔ so ketewa.

infoWeCollect.title: Infɔmehyɛn a yɛboaboa
infoWeCollect.account: Akuntyɛ infɔmehyɛn (te sɛ email/fon) na yɛde bɔ akuntyɛ na yɛhwɛ so.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Nsɛm/afrɛ a wɔabɔ ban (E2E) — yɛrentumi nkenkan.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Nsɛmmisa/ndwuma-tebea te sɛ crash logs, fidie tebea, anaa analytics ketewa de ma yɛyɛ adwuma yi yie.

howWeUse.title: Sɛnea yɛde infɔmehyɛn no di dwuma
howWeUse.provide: Ma asomdwoeɛ no so (auth, spam/abuse nhwehwɛe).

sharing.title: Kyɛ
sharing.body: Yɛntɔn data. Yɛbɛtumi akyɛ data kakra ama adwumayɛfo (processors) te sɛ push/analytics wɔ apam ankasa mu.

rights.title: Wo ho mmra
rights.body: Ɛda wo ɛkuo so (te sɛ GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA) sɛ wobɛbisa ho-hwehwɛmu, nsesa, pebɔ, anaa popa adwuma bi. Fɛre: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data sie & banbɔ
retention.body: Yɛsie deɛ ɛho hia kɛkɛ ma asomdwoeɛ no, na yɛde aban a ɛfata di ho dwuma. E2E nsɛm yɛrentumi mmbue.

children.title: Mmɔfra
children.body: Chatforia nnhyɛ mmɔfra a wodi mfe 13 (anaa sɛ wo man no pɛ) mu.

changes.title: Nsesaeɛ
changes.body: Yɛde nsakrae bɛto ha na yɛasan atwerɛ “Wɔde totoo so kɔ akyire” da no.

intro.body: Sɛ wode Chatforia di dwuma a, wokamfo Ntam Nhyiam yi. Sɛ wonkamfo a, mfa asomdwoeɛ no nndi dwuma.

accounts.title: Akuntyɛ
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Ma infɔmehyɛn nokware na kora wo kɔd yie.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Wone nea ɔkɔ so wɔ wo akuntyɛ mu no kɔntɔnkyefo.

acceptableUse.title: Nea ɛfata so de di dwuma
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Mommfa mmara-bɔne, atirimudeɛ, anaa nea ɛkɔ so nkɔ. Mommfa spam/auto-abuse nnyɛ.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Yɛbɛtumi agyae/atwa mu sɛ wobubu mmara.

yourContent.title: Wo nsɛm
yourContent.body: Wo na wugyina wo nsɛm akyi. Wode ho kwan ma yɛn na yɛadi dwuma (te sɛ routing, sie, nkyerɛaseɛ).

disclaimer.title: Nkyerɛwtohɔ & tiatia so
disclaimer.body: Asomdwoeɛ no de “sɛnea ɛte” na ɛba. Kɔsi baabi a mmara ma ho kwan, Chatforia nnya tiatia-so-ka ho asɛm te sɛ akwadworoma anaa akyinnye kɛse.

changes.title: Nsesaeɛ
changes.body: Yɛbetumi asesa Ntam Nhyiam yi; sɛ wokɔ so de di dwuma a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ wogye tom.

doNotSell.title: Mfa Me Ho Nnton anaa Mmma Nka Hɔ
doNotSell.body: Chatforia nnton data. Nanso Californiafo betumi asoma mbisaeɛ fa CPRA so wɔ button a ɛda ase yi so.

cookies.title: Cookie Nhyehyɛe
cookies.body: Chatforia de cookies ketewa nko ara na yɛde di dwuma (te sɛ session, banbɔ). Yɛmmfa adwumayɛfo ad-cookies nndi dwuma. Hwɛ wo browser nhyehyɛe na hwɛ cookie tebea.
